verses.1: Tua laitakin tuipi sung panin ganhing khat a hong pusuak ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in ki sawm le lutang sagih nei a, a ki sawmte tungah lukhu khat ciat om a, a lutang sagihte tungah min hoih lo khat ciat a kigelh hi.
verses.2: Tua ka muh ganhing pen kamkei tawh kibang a, a khete vom khe tawh kibang a, a kam pen humpinelkai kam tawh a kibang hi. Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama vangliatna, ama tokhom le aana lianpi a pia hi.
verses.3: A lutang khat in sih nading zahin liamma lianpi nei ngei napi-in damkik a, leitung mi khempeuh in lamdang sa-in tua ganhing a zui ngeingai uh hi.
verses.4: Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama aana pia ahih manin mite in tua gulpi a bia uh hi. A ganhing zong bia uh a, “Hih ganhing tawh a kibang kua om a, kua in amah su zo ding ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
verses.5: Tua ganhing, kiphatsakna le kam khel nono a pau theih nading le kha sawm le nih sung aana a zat theih nadingin thu kipia hi.
verses.6: Tua ahih manin Pasian, ama min, a omna mun le vantungah a omte khempeuh samsia-in a ko gawpgawp hi.
verses.7: Pasianʼ mite simin a zawh gawp theih nading zong kiphal hi. Minam tuamtuam, pau nam tuamtuam a zang mite khempeuh tungah uk theih nading aana a kipia hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih manin a kigo Tuuno laibu sungah a nungta ding miteʼ min, leitung pianmapekin a kikhumna ah a kihel lo leitung mi khempeuh in tua ganhing bia ding uh hi.
verses.9: “Salin a pai dingin a kiseh sa mite sal mahin pai dinga, namsau-in thah dingin a kiseh sate namsau mah tawh kithat ding hi. Tua ahih manin Pasianʼ mite in upna le thuak zawhna kisam hi,” a kicihna thu, zak nading bil a neite in za ta uh hen.
verses.11: Tua ciangin lei sung panin a hong pusuak ganhing a dang khat ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in tuu bangin ki nih nei a, a kampau zia pen gulpi kampau tawh kibang hi.
verses.12: Tua ganhing masa a omna mahah ganhing masaʼ aana khempeuh zang a, a liamma a dam sa tua ganhing masa pen leitung le a tunga om mi khempeuh, aana tawh a biasak hi.
verses.13: Tua ganhing nihna in nalamdang lian pipi bawl a, mi khempeuhteʼ muhin van panin leitungah meikuang nangawn a kiasak thei hi.
verses.14: Ganhing masa omna ah nalamdang bawl theih nading thu ngah ahih manin a nalamdang bawlna tawh leitungah a om mi khempeuh khem a, namsau tawh a si ding zahin a kisat liam sa hi napi a nungta lai ganhing pahtawi nading milim khat a bawl nadingun a gen hi.
verses.15: Tua ganhing nihna in ganhing masa lim dingin a kibawl milim sungah a hu a muap ciangin hong pau thei a, tua milim a bia lo khempeuh a thah theih nadingin thu a ngah hi.
verses.16: Tua ganhing in a lian a neu, a hau a zawng, sila le sila ahi lo, mi khempeuh in a taklam khut tung uh ahih kei leh a taltang uh ah ciaptehna a neih nadingun thu a pia hi.
verses.17: Tua ahih manin tua ganhing min ahih kei leh a min tangin a nambat ciaptehna a tungah a nei lo mi peuhmah, vanlei vanzuakin paikhia thei lo uh hi.
verses.18: Hih thu ah pilna kisam hi. Hih nambat pen 666 hi a, mihing khat min tangin a ding hi a, mi pil mi tei peuhpeuhte in hih ganhing nambat a cihnopna thei ding uh hi.
